beer.name: Lemon Ginger Hocus Pocus
beer.description: Hocus...Pocus...What deviltry is this? Lemon and Ginger now infuses the mix. Filled with the light of the essence that glows, a new ale of maximum quenching now flows. Stunningly crisp and supernaturally refreshing, it's the ginger and lemon wonder that's summer's own blessing.
